Package local.intranet.tombola.api.model.repository

Interface TicketRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Ticket,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Ticket,Long>
public interface TicketRepository extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Ticket,Long>
TicketRepository is repository for CRUD with Ticket

      @Query("select u from Ticket u order by case when u.win > 0 then u.modifiedDate else cast(0 as java.lang.Long) end desc, u.id") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Ticket> findPage(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
